column2: "Thanks for bringing us along for that investigation! I was really surprised by how strong you are."

"Thanks to you, I was able to gather plenty of data on the Forest. I'll compare it to my data from Ragol and figure out how similar the two are...
Or how different."
"I'm not an expert on this sort of thing, though. It'll take time, and I can't guarantee I'll get good results..."
"But I'm a Hunter, so I won't give up! I will do everything in my power to get home as soon as possible!"
